name: UrTurn
overview:
urTurn powers the Bodega Shop on Facebook that is the first marketplace to trade virtual currencies, and gifts.

VIRTUAL SHOP Users can buy goods using our virtual currency - Bodega Bills. Itâ€™s how you do your shopping in our marketplace. Use BBs to buy virtual gifts, currencies and goods. Itâ€™s the Bodega way to shop!

VIRTUAL SALES Bodega is the first marketplace that allows you to sell anything virtual, i.e., Mafia War points, Farmville coins, etc.

VIRTUAL BIDS Bid on things like virtual gifts to send to your friends. Bid with your bodega friends to get cheaper prices.

REAL CASH Shop, Sell, Bid then Cash out! Redeem your BBs for real cash transferred directly to your Paypal account. BBs can also be cashed out toward a charity of your choice to impact the community.

Connect your Friends to Bodega and go shopping together!
